name: Deinonychus

trait.name: Pounce
text: If the deinonychus moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the deinonychus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The deinonychus makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

description:
This larger cousin of the velociraptor kills by gripping its target with its claws and feeding while the creature is still alive.
Source: Volo's Guide to Monsters p. 139, Tomb of Annihilation
